categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: Asset I-40 was a member of the intelligence network that served the independent operative known as the Shroud during the Galactic War between the Galactic Republic and the Sith Empire. I-40 was stationed in the Sith Academy on the planet Korriban, but around 3637 BBY, I-40 and fellow asset I-12 went missing, leading the Shroud to believe them dead, prompting the Shroud to send Asset I-4 to investigate.
